text: Thanks <@U0H4SJN11>. Quickly following up here: If I'm reading correctly, sonor sensor isn't going to be helpful in detecting proximity?
iâ€™m not totally clear on how sonar interprets individuals in a crowd? or are we just using like, closest point?

The idea was recommended by Robert @ ZGF for an attraction state. I think the theory was that it would act like a proximity sensor (e.g. Given a user is within 5 ft., then the sonar should signal to embedded LEDs to get a bit brighter. As user moves closer or more users join fray, than podium should get brighter.)
Sonar may still be helpful as redundant sensor. Still need to test things out
